subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which ruler of Rajasthan was appointed as the Maharaja by the British?
question_hi: राजस्थान के परमाणुओं से निर्वाण दिए गए राजाओं में एक था।
explanation_en: Rao Gaekwad III, also known as Maharaja Sayajirao III, was one of the rulers of Rajasthan who were appointed by the British. He became the Maharaja of Baroda after the British annexed the state.
explanation_hi: राव गैक्वाद III, बारवादा के राजा बनने वाले महाराजा सयसज़ोर वाले एक राजों में थे, जो बंगाना की राजने की क्या निवासना के वैशवाना?
explanation_en: Rao Gaekwad III, also known as Maharaja Sayajirao III, was one of the rulers of the British-annexed state of Baroda. He succeeded his father, Maharaja Sayajirao II, as the ruler of Baroda.
explanation_hi: राव गैक्वाद महाराजा सयसज़िरा जी ने बंगाना के वैशवाना?
